meanings: (병·소문·기운 등이) spread; (소문 등이) circulate, travel, go[get] around[about] (=번지다)

vlive.korean: 이거 보이니? - 반원 - 그리고 밑으로 쫙 퍼져 있고 - 보여? Do you see this? - Half-sphere. - Spread out below. - Do you see? 듣기 View video OSEN : '스타로드' CIX 배진영, 이건 꼭 봐야하는 귀여움 #EP
vlive.english: Do you see this? - Half-sphere. - Spread out below. - Do you see?

vlive.korean: 그러면 진짜 면이 많이 퍼져있었으면 좋겠어요. Then I'd wish the noodles were just soggy. 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [보나 은서] 연자매의 마음대로 EP.01 일심동체💖
vlive.english: Then I'd wish the noodles were just soggy.

vlive.korean: 좀 퍼져. Let's spread out. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 아스트로 미니팬미팅하러 가용♡♡♡
스르르 퍼져요. It spreads like a veil. 듣기 View video 10PM : 월요일 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 WITH 스타트렉 배우 내한 현장 A night's entertainment news
온 집안에 다 울려 퍼져요. We can hear it all over the dorm. 듣기 View video PENTAGON : 펜타곤 - Be your Valentine ♡ Behind PART 2
vlive.english: We can hear it all over the dorm.

examples.korean: Delicious smells wafted up from the kitchen. 발음듣기 부엌에서 맛있는 냄새가 퍼져 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Delicious smells wafted up from the kitchen. 발음

examples.korean: Rumours are rife that he is going to resign. 발음듣기 그가 사임할 것이라는 소문이 널리 퍼져 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rumours are rife that he is going to resign. 발음

examples.korean: The sound of their voices wafted across the lake. 발음듣기 그들의 목소리가 호수 너머로 퍼져 갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The sound of their voices wafted across the lake. 발음

examples.korean: The scent of the flowers was wafted along by the breeze. 발음듣기 꽃향기가 미풍을 타고 퍼져 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The scent of the flowers was wafted along by the breeze. 발음

examples.korean: a sheet of flame 발음듣기 거대하게 퍼져 이동하는 불덩이 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
